subject: Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Carolina Kostner earned the Cup of Russia gold in Moscow, topping the error-strewn overnight leader Fumie Suguri with an elegant free skate. Suguri’s mistakes allowed the American Rachel Flatt to take the silver medal. Suguri of Japan finished third.
